post:
Hi,

I have a spare VPS with servermania in buffalo/NY which I don't need anymore.

Specs are 2x vCore, 2GB RAM, 2 GB vSwap, 100GB SSD-Cached Disk (Raid), 2 IPv4, 3 TB Bandwidth.

Actually this is advertised at 56$, this one is only <strong>48$ yearly recurring</strong>.

It has to be renewed on 01/05/2015 so there are over 8 months left to use, which are already paid.

<img width=700 src=http://s15.postimg.org/8b4c7k8x7/servm.jpg />

<code>CPU model :  Intel(R) Xeon(R) CPU E3-1270 v3 @ 3.50GHz
Number of cores : 2
CPU frequency :  3055.333 MHz
Total amount of ram : 2048 MB
Total amount of swap : 2048 MB
System uptime :   6 days, 15:11,
Download speed from CacheFly: 48,8MB/s
Download speed from Coloat, Atlanta GA: 28,3MB/s
Download speed from Softlayer, Dallas, TX: 29,9MB/s
Download speed from Linode, Tokyo, JP: 7,17MB/s

I yet have to ask their support, what is required to get transfer done, but suppose this wont really be a matter ;-)

I'll give it away for a 29$ payment via paypal, just comment here or PM me if interested in...
